description.en: Gear goes off cooldown {CDReduct} faster.
You take {ArmorBoost} less damage from all sources.
Your weapons reload {RldSpeedBoost} quicker.
Autocannons and shotguns deal {DmgBoost} more damage.
You take {DmgResist} less damage from enemies within {Dist}.
Boosts primary and secondary stats of Defense gear by {AbilParamBoost}.
Whenever all your gear is on cooldown, activates a {ShieldHP} shield for {Duration}.
If you are in the air for over {CastDuration}, deal {DmgBoost} more damage against armor.
Assists reduce cooldowns of your gear by {CDReduct}.
Boosts all your gear damage by {AbilParamBoost}.
Restores {ShieldHP} more shield per second.
Boosts rate of fire by {FireRateBoost}.
Damaging an enemy with your gear boosts rate of fire by {FireRateBoost} for {Duration}.
Your shotguns and special weapons deal {DmgBoost} more damage.
Boosts your shield by {ShieldBoost}.
Boosts primary and secondary stats of Movement gear by {AbilParamBoost}.
Hitting an enemy that has not damaged you in the last {SecCastDur} restores {FuelReg} fuel. Cooldown: {CD}
Using any gear reduces incoming damage by {DmgResist} for {Duration}.
Every kill increases a random parameter of your core gear by {AbilParamBoost}
If your Robot has more than 6 modules, deal {DmgBoost} extra weapon damage for every module past the sixth.
If your team has more kills than the enemy, your weapons reload faster by {RldSpeedBoost}
Every assist or kill grants you extra {TitanCharge} Titan points.
Pushing enemy's module into critical state regenerates {ShieldBoost} of your shield.
Artillery and sniper weapons deal {DmgBoost} more damage.
Shield regenerates {ShieldRegBoost} faster.
Boosts support-type gear by {AbilParamBoost}.
Whenever enemy hits your undamaged module, take {DmgResist} less damage for {Duration}
If no enemies are within {Dist}, fuel regenerates faster by {FuelRegBoost}
After destroying a foe from at least {Dist}, your weapons reload {ReloadBoost} faster.
Whenever you lose shields, the most damaged module regenerates {RegenSpeed} structure per second for {Duration}.
Using any gear charges up your cycle gear by {UltCharge} points.
Increases maximum fuel by {FuelCap}.
Artillery and sniper weapons have a {Chance} chance to deal {DmgBoost} more damage.
Your autocannons and rocket launchers deal {DmgBoost} more damage.
For every {Dmg} total damage you deal, instantly regenerates {ShieldBoost} of shield.
Boosts primary and secondary stats of Attack gear by {AbilParamBoost}.
If two or more allies are within 100m, boosts all of your gear's primary stats by {AbilParamBoost} for {Duration}.
If two or more allies are within {Dist}, your weapons deal {DmgBoost} more damage.
Assists boost your speed and mobility by {SpeedBoostTal} for {Duration}.
Activating any gear speeds you up by {SpeedBoostTal}.
Taking damage speeds up your weapon reload by {RldSpeedBoost} every {CD}.
If any module has less than {HP_Cap} of armor, you take {DmgResist} less damage from all sources.
Activating any defensive gear reduces shield cooldown by {ShieldDelay} for {Duration}.
After losing shields, reflects {DmgReturn} of damage taken over the next {Duration} back at the enemy. Cooldown: {CD}.
Your weapons deal {DmgBoost} more damage against enemies within {Dist}.
After your module armor drops below {HPLim}, get {ShieldHP} shield. Can activate once per module.
Destroying an enemy refills up to {AmmoPerc} of your ammunition.
Destroying an enemy within {Dist} restores {Armor} armor to all modules.
If any of your modules is missing more than {HP_Cap} of armor, your weapons deal {DmgBoost} more damage.
All corrosive and fire effects deal {DmgBoost} more damage and last {DurBoost} longer.
Destroying enemies boosts your blast damage by {DmgBoost} for {Duration}.
When the pilot deals targeted damage directly to an enemy module, there is a {Chance} chance that the damage will ricochet into all other modules.

ui_description.en: Slam! Damage to all enemy modules

description.en: Using Support gear restores {Armor} armor to all damaged modules.
Staying still for {SecCastDur} boosts your weapon damage by {DmgBoost}. Cancels on movement.
If any enemy is within {Dist}, you take {ArmorBoost} less damage.
If any enemy is within {Dist}, increases rate of fire by {FireRateBoost}
Staying still for {SecCastDur} adds {ShieldHP} to your shields. Cancels on movement.
